‚úÖ Successfully subscribed {channel} to automatic message clearing every **{timer}**

clear.description: Manually trigger a message clear for a subscribed channel

subscription.description: Manage automatic message clearing for channels

ignore.description: Toggle messages or users to be ignored during channel clearing

ignore.message_removed: ‚úÖ Message from {author} will **no longer be ignored** during clearing in {channel}
ignore.user_added: ‚úÖ {user}'s messages will be **ignored** during clearing in {channel}
ignore.user_removed: ‚úÖ {user}'s messages will **no longer be ignored** during clearing in {channel}

change.description: Change the default timezone for your server

‚Ä¢ `15:30 EST` for daily at 3:30 PM EST
